attributes.action: To Teach First Aid in Senior Schools in Great Britain 🇬🇧.
attributes.background:
I’d like the basic life saving skills to be taught to pupils in all Secondary schools in Great Britain 🇬🇧 as part of the school curriculum. 
Teach First Aid to pupils.

rejection.details:
First aid training is already part of the health curriculum for schools, which you can see on page 37 + 38 of the curriculum guidance here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/1090195/Relationships_Education_RSE_and_Health_Education.pdf
